com.zenika.varnishtest

Class CommandLineBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zenika.varnishtest.CommandLineBuilder

  • public class CommandLineBuilder
extends Object
    This class allows to build a proper command line for varnishtest execution. The test case (vtc) file that should be part of the command line is expected in the VarnishtestRunner class.

    Varnishtest accepts macros, but the following name cannot be set :

    • varnishd
    Macro names are validated against this regex : "\\w+(\\.\\w+)*"

    Author:
    Dridi Boukelmoune
    See Also:
    VarnishtestRunner.VarnishtestRunner(CommandLineBuilder), VarnishtestRunner.runTestCase(java.io.File)

      • setVarnishdCommand

        public CommandLineBuilder setVarnishdCommand(String varnishdCommand)
        Set a non-empty command line for varnishd. This might be needed for unprivileged users without /usr/sbin in their PATH. In that case, instead of running a plain varnishd command, varnishtest could run /usr/sbin/varnishd.
        Parameters:
        varnishdCommand - the varnishd command
        Returns:
        this builder
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the command is null or empty
